systemData.Description: The system metadata relating to this resource.

presentationWindowDuration.Description: The relative to end sliding window.

liveBackoffDuration.Description: The relative to end right edge.

timescale.Description: The time scale of time stamps.

forceEndTimestamp.Description: The indicator of forcing existing of end time stamp.

createdBy.Description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.Description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.Description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

systemData.Description: The system metadata relating to this resource.

identity.Description: The Managed Identity for the Media Services account.

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

storageAccounts.Description: The storage accounts for this resource.

keyDelivery.Description: The Key Delivery properties for Media Services account.

publicNetworkAccess.Description: Whether or not public network access is allowed for resources under the Media Services account.

provisioningState.Description: Provisioning state of the Media Services account.

privateEndpointConnections.Description: The Private Endpoint Connections created for the Media Service account.

minimumTlsVersion.Description: The minimum TLS version allowed for this account's requests. This is an optional property. If unspecified, a secure default value will be used.

id.Description: The ID of the storage account resource. Media Services relies on tables and queues as well as blobs, so the primary storage account must be a Standard Storage account (either Microsoft.ClassicStorage or Microsoft.Storage). Blob only storage accounts can be added as secondary storage accounts.

type.Description: The type of the storage account.

status.Description: The current status of the storage account mapping.

userAssignedIdentity.Description: The user assigned managed identity's ARM ID to use when accessing a resource.

useSystemAssignedIdentity.Description: Indicates whether to use System Assigned Managed Identity. Mutual exclusive with User Assigned Managed Identity.

type.Description: The type of key used to encrypt the Account Key.

keyVaultProperties.Description: The properties of the key used to encrypt the account.

status.Description: The current status of the Key Vault mapping.

keyIdentifier.Description: The URL of the Key Vault key used to encrypt the account. The key may either be versioned (for example https://vault/keys/mykey/version1) or reference a key without a version (for example https://vault/keys/mykey).

currentKeyIdentifier.Description: The current key used to encrypt the Media Services account, including the key version.

accessControl.Description: The access control properties for Key Delivery.

defaultAction.Description: The behavior for IP access control in Key Delivery.

ipAllowList.Description: The IP allow list for access control in Key Delivery. If the default action is set to 'Allow', the IP allow list must be empty.

id.Description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. Ex - /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}

type.Description: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"

privateEndpoint.Description: The resource of private end point.

privateLinkServiceConnectionState.Description: A collection of information about the state of the connection between service consumer and provider.

provisioningState.Description: The provisioning state of the private endpoint connection resource.

id.Description: The ARM identifier for Private Endpoint

status.Description: Indicates whether the connection has been Approved/Rejected/Removed by the owner of the service.

description.Description: The reason for approval/rejection of the connection.

actionsRequired.Description: A message indicating if changes on the service provider require any updates on the consumer.

principalId.Description: The Principal ID of the identity.

tenantId.Description: The Tenant ID of the identity.

systemData.Description: The system metadata relating to this resource.

created.Description: The creation date of the Asset.

lastModified.Description: The last modified date of the Asset.

alternateId.Description: The alternate ID of the Asset.

container.Description: The name of the asset blob container.

storageAccountName.Description: The name of the storage account.

storageEncryptionFormat.Description: The Asset encryption format. One of None or MediaStorageEncryption.

encryptionScope.Description: The Asset container encryption scope in the storage account.

systemData.Description: The system metadata relating to this resource.

track.Description: Detailed information about a track in the asset.

provisioningState.Description: Provisioning state of the asset track.

fileName.Description: The file name to the source file. This file is located in the storage container of the asset.

displayName.Description: The display name of the audio track on a video player. In HLS, this maps to the NAME attribute of EXT-X-MEDIA.

languageCode.Description: The RFC5646 language code for the audio track.

hlsSettings.Description: The HLS specific setting for the audio track.

dashSettings.Description: The DASH specific setting for the audio track.

mpeg4TrackId.Description: The MPEG-4 audio track ID for the audio track.

bitRate.Description: The stream bit rate for the audio track.

default.Description: The default for the HLS setting.

forced.Description: The forced for the HLS setting.

characteristics.Description: The characteristics for the HLS setting.

role.Description: The role for the DASH setting.

fileName.Description: The file name to the source file. This file is located in the storage container of the asset.

displayName.Description: The display name of the text track on a video player. In HLS, this maps to the NAME attribute of EXT-X-MEDIA.

languageCode.Description: The RFC5646 language code for the text track.

playerVisibility.Description: When PlayerVisibility is set to "Visible", the text track will be present in the DASH manifest or HLS playlist when requested by a client. When the PlayerVisibility is set to "Hidden", the text will not be available to the client. The default value is "Visible".

hlsSettings.Description: The HLS specific setting for the text track.

properties.Description: The properties of the Content Key Policy.

systemData.Description: The system metadata relating to this resource.

created.Description: The creation date of the Policy

lastModified.Description: The last modified date of the Policy

restriction.Description: The requirements that must be met to deliver keys with this configuration

ask.Description: The key that must be used as FairPlay Application Secret key. This needs to be base64 encoded.

fairPlayPfxPassword.Description: The password encrypting FairPlay certificate in PKCS 12 (pfx) format.

fairPlayPfx.Description: The Base64 representation of FairPlay certificate in PKCS 12 (pfx) format (including private key).

rentalAndLeaseKeyType.Description: The rental and lease key type.

rentalDuration.Description: The rental duration. Must be greater than or equal to 0.

allowTestDevices.Description: A flag indicating whether test devices can use the license.

relativeBeginDate.Description: The relative begin date of license.

relativeExpirationDate.Description: The relative expiration date of license.

firstPlayExpiration.Description: The amount of time that the license is valid after the license is first used to play content.

scmsRestriction.Description: Configures the Serial Copy Management System (SCMS) in the license. Must be between 0 and 3 inclusive.

agcAndColorStripeRestriction.Description: Configures Automatic Gain Control (AGC) and Color Stripe in the license. Must be between 0 and 3 inclusive.

explicitAnalogTelevisionOutputRestrictio.Description: Configures the Explicit Analog Television Output Restriction in the license. Configuration data must be between 0 and 3 inclusive.

digitalVideoOnlyContentRestriction.Description: Enables the Image Constraint For Analog Component Video Restriction in the license.

imageConstraintForAnalogComponentVideoRe.Description: Enables the Image Constraint For Analog Component Video Restriction in the license.

imageConstraintForAnalogComputerMonitorR.Description: Enables the Image Constraint For Analog Component Video Restriction in the license.

allowPassingVideoContentToUnknownOutput.Description: Configures Unknown output handling settings of the license.

uncompressedDigitalVideoOpl.Description: Specifies the output protection level for uncompressed digital video.

compressedDigitalVideoOpl.Description: Specifies the output protection level for compressed digital video.

analogVideoOpl.Description: Specifies the output protection level for compressed digital audio.

compressedDigitalAudioOpl.Description: Specifies the output protection level for compressed digital audio.

uncompressedDigitalAudioOpl.Description: Specifies the output protection level for uncompressed digital audio.

bestEffort.Description: Indicates whether this restriction is enforced on a Best Effort basis.

configurationData.Description: Configures the restriction control bits. Must be between 0 and 3 inclusive.

alternateVerificationKeys.Description: A list of alternative verification keys.

requiredClaims.Description: A list of required token claims.

keyValue.Description: The key value of the key

rawBody.Description: The raw data field of a certificate in PKCS 12 format (X509Certificate2 in .NET)

properties.Description: Class to specify properties of Streaming Policy

systemData.Description: The system metadata relating to this resource.

defaultContentKeyPolicyName.Description: Default ContentKey used by current Streaming Policy

clearTracks.Description: Representing which tracks should not be encrypted

contentKeys.Description: Representing default content key for each encryption scheme and separate content keys for specific tracks

customKeyAcquisitionUrlTemplate.Description: Template for the URL of the custom service delivering keys to end user players.  Not required when using Azure Media Services for issuing keys.  The template supports replaceable tokens that the service will update at runtime with the value specific to the request.  The currently supported token values are {AlternativeMediaId}, which is replaced with the value of StreamingLocatorId.AlternativeMediaId, and {ContentKeyId}, which is replaced with the value of identifier of the key being requested.

trackSelections.Description: TrackSelections is a track property condition list which can specify track(s)

defaultKey.Description: Default content key for an encryption scheme

keyToTrackMappings.Description: Representing tracks needs separate content key

label.Description: Label can be used to specify Content Key when creating a Streaming Locator
Label can be used to specify Content Key when creating a Streaming Locator

tracks.Description: Tracks which use this content key

clearTracks.Description: Representing which tracks should not be encrypted

contentKeys.Description: Representing default content key for each encryption scheme and separate content keys for specific tracks

drm.Description: Configuration of DRMs for CommonEncryptionCenc encryption scheme

clearKeyEncryptionConfiguration.Description: Optional configuration supporting ClearKey in CommonEncryptionCenc encryption scheme.

customLicenseAcquisitionUrlTemplate.Description: Template for the URL of the custom service delivering licenses to end user players.  Not required when using Azure Media Services for issuing licenses.  The template supports replaceable tokens that the service will update at runtime with the value specific to the request.  The currently supported token values are {AlternativeMediaId}, which is replaced with the value of StreamingLocatorId.AlternativeMediaId, and {ContentKeyId}, which is replaced with the value of identifier of the key being requested.

Template for the URL of the custom service delivering licenses to end user players.  Not required when using Azure Media Services for issuing licenses.  The template supports replaceable tokens that the service will update at runtime with the value specific to the request.  The currently supported token values are {AlternativeMediaId}, which is replaced with the value of StreamingLocatorId.AlternativeMediaId, and {ContentKeyId}, which is replaced with the value of identifier of the key being requested.

customKeysAcquisitionUrlTemplate.Description: Template for the URL of the custom service delivering content keys to end user players. Not required when using Azure Media Services for issuing licenses. The template supports replaceable tokens that the service will update at runtime with the value specific to the request.  The currently supported token value is {AlternativeMediaId}, which is replaced with the value of StreamingLocatorId.AlternativeMediaId.

clearTracks.Description: Representing which tracks should not be encrypted

contentKeys.Description: Representing default content key for each encryption scheme and separate content keys for specific tracks

drm.Description: Configuration of DRMs for current encryption scheme

clearKeyEncryptionConfiguration.Description: Optional configuration supporting ClearKey in CommonEncryptionCbcs encryption scheme.

customLicenseAcquisitionUrlTemplate.Description: Template for the URL of the custom service delivering licenses to end user players.  Not required when using Azure Media Services for issuing licenses.  The template supports replaceable tokens that the service will update at runtime with the value specific to the request.  The currently supported token values are {AlternativeMediaId}, which is replaced with the value of StreamingLocatorId.AlternativeMediaId, and {ContentKeyId}, which is replaced with the value of identifier of the key being requested.

allowPersistentLicense.Description: All license to be persistent or not

systemData.Description: The system metadata relating to this resource.

created.Description: The creation time of the Streaming Locator.

startTime.Description: The start time of the Streaming Locator.

endTime.Description: The end time of the Streaming Locator.

streamingLocatorId.Description: The StreamingLocatorId of the Streaming Locator.

streamingPolicyName.Description: Name of the Streaming Policy used by this Streaming Locator. Either specify the name of Streaming Policy you created or use one of the predefined Streaming Policies. The predefined Streaming Policies available are: 'Predefined_DownloadOnly', 'Predefined_ClearStreamingOnly', 'Predefined_DownloadAndClearStreaming', 'Predefined_ClearKey', 'Predefined_MultiDrmCencStreaming' and 'Predefined_MultiDrmStreaming'

defaultContentKeyPolicyName.Description: Name of the default ContentKeyPolicy used by this Streaming Locator.

contentKeys.Description: The ContentKeys used by this Streaming Locator.

alternativeMediaId.Description: Alternative Media ID of this Streaming Locator

filters.Description: A list of asset or account filters which apply to this streaming locator

labelReferenceInStreamingPolicy.Description: Label of Content Key as specified in the Streaming Policy

tracks.Description: Tracks which use this Content Key

groupId.Description: The private link resource group id.

requiredMembers.Description: The private link resource required member names.

requiredZoneNames.Description: The private link resource Private link DNS zone name.

systemData.Description: The system metadata relating to this resource.

identity.Description: The Managed Identity for the Media Services account.

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

deviceId.Description: Unique identifier of the edge device.

dataCollectionFrequency.Description: Usage data collection frequency in ISO 8601 duration format e.g. PT10M , PT5H.

dataReportingFrequency.Description: Usage data reporting frequency in ISO 8601 duration format e.g. PT10M , PT5H.

maxAllowedUnreportedUsageDuration.Description: Maximum time for which the functionality of the device will not be hampered for not reporting the usage data.

eventHubDetails.Description: Details of Event Hub where the usage will be reported.

name.Description: Name of the Event Hub where usage will be reported.

namespace.Description: Namespace of the Event Hub where usage will be reported.

token.Description: SAS token needed to interact with Event Hub.

permissions.Description: The permissions to set on the SAS URL.

expiryTime.Description: The SAS URL expiration time.  This must be less than 24 hours from the current time.

assetContainerSasUrls.Description: The list of Asset container SAS URLs.

created.Description: The creation time of the Streaming Locator.

startTime.Description: The start time of the Streaming Locator.

endTime.Description: The end time of the Streaming Locator.

streamingPolicyName.Description: Name of the Streaming Policy used by this Streaming Locator.

defaultContentKeyPolicyName.Description: Name of the default ContentKeyPolicy used by this Streaming Locator.

contentKeys.Description: ContentKeys used by current Streaming Locator

streamingPaths.Description: Streaming Paths supported by current Streaming Locator

downloadPaths.Description: Download Paths supported by current Streaming Locator

paths.Description: Streaming paths for each protocol and encryptionScheme pair
